author: Moanwar
body:
A new PFN model has been prepared to address the issue identified by the NGT group during JetValidation at HLT. This model will be accompanied by a fix in the main code, as the root cause was missing geometry information in the rechit tools, leading to incorrect regressed energy assignments to candidates.

FYI @felicepantaleo @waredjeb @hatakeyamak
title: New regression model v1
